concept.title: How to set the working project and corpus
concept.shortdesc: Choose your corpora and your projects

conbody.p: Before you can start working with texts, you need to set your working corpora in the Preference Settings. If you cannot see the corpora you expected, try changing the project you work in ("Project settings"). You can also access preferences quickly by clicking on "Preferences" in the upper right corner of the user interface. Make sure that you have opened the correct view on the BTS (the symbol "Textcorpus" in the toolbar in the upper right corner should be encircled, as opposed to the Lemma or Thesaurus). Now you can start.
